title: How to Send Direct Messages on TikTok: A Beginner's Guide

steps.title: Open the TikTok app and tap Inbox.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app and tap Inbox . You will see the Inbox option at the bottom of the app. You can send a message to a friend or a mutual (someone you follow and who follows you back) unless they have their direct message privacy setting set to No one . If you try to send a direct message to someone who doesn't follow you, the user will need to approve the message request first. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the magnifying glass icon and enter a username.
steps.content: Tap the magnifying glass icon and enter a username. This is at the top-right corner. You can enter someone's display name or TikTok username.

steps.title: Tap the user you want to message.
steps.content: Tap the user you want to message. This will open the conversation with you and the user. If the user doesn't follow you, you'll see a warning at the top that says you can only send up to 3 messages until the user accepts your direct message request.

steps.title: Type a message.
steps.content: Type a message. You can send simple text, or you can tap the Emoji button to browse through GIFs, emojis, and stickers to send. If needed, you can include a TikTok post by tapping Share post and navigating to the post.

steps.title: Tap Send.
steps.content: Tap Send . This may look like an airplane icon or arrow on some devices. Your message will be sent to the user. If the user doesn't follow you, you'll need to wait for your message request to be approved.

steps.title: Open the TikTok app and tap Inbox.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app and tap Inbox . This is at the bottom of the app. Keep in mind that group chat isn't currently available in all regions.

steps.title: Tap the "New group" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "New group" icon. You can find this in the top-left corner. This looks like two overlapping people with a + .

steps.title: Select the friends you want to add.
steps.content: Select the friends you want to add. If you don't see the friends you want to add, enter their name in the search bar, or tap Find friends to add more people. Alternatively, tap Create group with a link to create a shareable link to join your group.

steps.title: Tap Start group chat.
steps.content: Tap Start group chat . This will create your group chat. If you chose to create a link, copy and paste the link in your friend's DM, or send it on another social media platform or messaging app.

steps.title: You can't send photos or any other media that does not come from TikTok’s platform.
steps.content: You can't send photos or any other media that does not come from TikTok’s platform. However, you can use direct messaging to send regular text-based messages, videos uploaded to the TikTok app, GIFs , stickers, and emojis.

steps.title: You may have a flagged account, or the user has changed their DM settings.
steps.content: You may have a flagged account, or the user has changed their DM settings. If you can't send direct messages to anyone, your account may be flagged or suspended . This can happen if you violate TikTok's Community Guidelines. However, if you can't send direct messages to only one person, it's likely the user has set their direct message settings to allow messages from only certain people or no one at all.

steps.title: Delete a chat.
steps.content: Delete a chat. If you want to remove the entire chat conversation from your TikTok inbox, do the following: Navigate to your Inbox . Swipe on a chat (iOS) or tap and hold a chat (Android). Tap Delete . Tap Confirm (iOS).

steps.title: Delete a single direct message.
steps.content: Delete a single direct message. To remove a single direct message from your TikTok inbox, do the following: Navigate to your Inbox . Tap a chat. Tap and hold the message. Tap Delete . Tap Delete for me or Delete for everyone (if sent within 3 minutes).

steps.title: Mute a chat.
steps.content: Mute a chat. If you don't have to delete any chat conversations or messages, you can choose to mute the chat instead. This will stop all notifications for the chat. Do the following: Navigate to your Inbox . Swipe on a chat and tap More (iOS), or tap and hold a chat (Android). Tap Mute .

steps.title: Accept or delete message requests.
steps.content: Accept or delete message requests. If you get a message request from another user, you can choose to accept it to allow direct messages or delete it to remove the request from your inbox. Do the following: Navigate to your Inbox . Tap Message requests . Select a chat request. Tap Accept or Delete .

steps.title: Report a direct message.
steps.content: Report a direct message. If you're receiving a direct message that violates TikTok's Community Guidelines, you can report it. Do the following: Navigate to your Inbox . Swipe on a chat (iOS) or tap and hold a chat (Android). Tap Report . Follow the on-screen steps.

steps.title: Enable or disable your read status.
steps.content: Enable or disable your read status. The read status lets other users know if and when you've read their direct messages. This feature will only work if both users have read status turned on. Do the following: Tap Profile . Tap ☰ Menu . Tap Settings and privacy . Tap Privacy . Tap Direct messages . Turn off or on Read status .

steps.title: Changing your direct message privacy settings.
steps.content: Changing your direct message privacy settings. If you don't want certain people to message you, or if you want to open your DMs, you can easily change your settings. Do the following: Tap Profile . Tap ☰ Menu . Tap Settings and privacy . Tap Privacy . Tap Direct messages . Select Everyone , Suggested friends , Friends , or No one .

steps.title: Can you send pictures on TikTok DM?
steps.content: Can you send pictures on TikTok DM? You can't send pictures from your device on a TikTok direct message. You can only send content uploaded to TikTok (such as videos), stickers, GIFs, emojis, or regular text.

steps.title: How do you DM someone on TikTok?
steps.content: How do you DM someone on TikTok? To DM someone on TikTok, open your inbox and search for the user (or navigate to their profile) and select the message icon.

steps.title: Can you text on TikTok?
steps.content: Can you text on TikTok? You can send text-based messages on TikTok as long as you're connected to a Wi-Fi or cellular network.

steps.title: Why can't I send TikToks to my friend?
steps.content: Why can't I send TikToks to my friend? If you can't send TikToks to your friend, they may have changed their direct message privacy settings. They must have DMs set to Friends or another public option. Otherwise, you'll be unable to send DMs. In some cases, your friend's account may be suspended or disabled, resulting in failed direct messages.
